scripts.dist:commit: git add . && git add dist -f && git commit -m "deploying dist"
scripts.predeploy: npm run dist:refresh && npm run dist:commit
scripts.main:push: git add . && git commit -m "deployed to dist" && git push origin main
scripts.dist:push: git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
scripts.deploy: npm run dist:push && npm run main:push
